articles.title: U.S. completes deporting 8 men from various nations to South Sudan after weeks of legal battles - PBS
articles.description: Eight men deported from the United States in May and held under guard for weeks at an American military base in the African nation of Djibouti while their legal challenges played out in court have now reached the Trump administration's intended destination, w…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Eight men deported from the United States in May and held under guard for weeks at an American military base in the African nation of Djibouti while their legal challenges played out … [+2522 chars]
